define: This API checks whether a given shop_id is eligible to enroll in the Brazil Fulfilled-by-Shopee (FBS) service.

error_list.name: fbs_err_shop_sku_not_related
error_list.description: Shop and SKU is not related

error_list.name: fbs_err_system
error_list.description: System error, please try again later

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.
